product_details.name: Classic Ray-Ban New Wayfarer - Timeless Style Meets Premium Protection
product_details.description:
• Authentic Ray-Ban polarized sunglasses with signature design
• Premium black glossy acetate frame construction
• Dark tinted UV-protective lenses for optimal sun protection
• Iconic silver Ray-Ban logo on temple
• Comfortable and lightweight wear for all-day use
• Universal fit suitable for most face shapes
• Includes original Ray-Ban case and cleaning cloth
• 100% UV protection against harmful rays
• Durable high-quality hinges for long-lasting performance
• Classic wayfarer style that never goes out of fashion

banner_details:
The banner features a sleek and modern layout designed to highlight a premium eyewear product. It centers around a large product image (`product_image`) positioned against a dark radial gradient background (`background`) with subtle decorative corner accents. At the top, a bold, attention-grabbing headline (`heading`) sets an upbeat promotional tone. Directly beneath, a smaller subheadline (`subheading`) introduces the product name in an elegant style. Supporting text (`tagline`) emphasizes key selling points, followed by a prominently displayed price (`price`) in bright yellow, conveying affordability. A high-contrast call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`) invites user engagement, making the banner both informative and visually effective.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Gray (#1A1A1A)
- Off-White (#FFFFFF)
- Golden Yellow (#FFD700)
- Jet Black (#000000)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of sleek Ray-Ban sunglasses featuring a minimalistic and modern black aesthetic. The primary color is a glossy **jet black** (#000000) used for both the frames and lenses, conveying sophistication and elegance. Accents like the **metallic silver** (#C0C0C0) logo and hinge bolts offer contrast and highlight brand identity subtly. The black tones blend smoothly with subtle hints of **charcoal gray** (#2E2E2E), especially in the lens reflections, adding depth. For an appealing advertisement banner, a color palette with **jet black (#000000)**, **metallic silver (#C0C0C0)**, **charcoal gray (#2E2E2E)**, and **white (#FFFFFF)** will maintain the premium and timeless appeal.
